name: grpcweb-hello
description: Learning grpc-web with react and node

scripts.install:dependencies: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean:dependencies: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build:client: npm run clean:client && cd client && npm run build && mv build ../build
scripts.start:production: npm run build:client && npm run start:server

author: Neil Leeson Syiemlieh
